name: Chloe Spencer
text: Features lovely decor and a spacious outdoor dining area. Definitely try the Golden Goose cocktail if you love sweet things! Legitimately one of the best cocktails I have ever had. A lot of cocktails are WAY too boozy for me but this one ‚Ä¶More

name: Drew Hardy
text: Normally Mellow is my favorite pizza place. Unfortunately, however, it seems like the Buckhead locations standards have fallen greatly since the initial COVID shut down. I ordered for delivery and requested extra dressing for my salad. ‚Ä¶More

name: P. Taylor
text: They have to go drinks!!! 1st time visit. Pizza was delicious. Crust was fluffy buttery and crispy all together. I had garlic base on my pizza which made for a great tasting crust. Service was very good. Server was Colin.

name: mustafaa khalipha
text: THE CUSTOMER SERVICE WAS GREAT AND ALSO WAS THE FOOD. A WILL RECOMMEND THIS RESTAURANT

name: Lexi
text: Their pizza and drinks are very good so I couldn't give less then four stars. The only criticism I have is that they seem to go light on the toppings. I'd recommend ordering extra of your favorite toppings. For take out you can sit at the ‚Ä¶More

name: Kate Stahl
text: Stopped in with the friend for lunch. Huge big screen tvs all over. Great place to relax but catch a game. Offers vegan pizza option also.FYI you have to order a whole pizza. Not sold by the slice. Our server always was excellent. Parking was minimal though. Food came out in good time, and was hot. Will come back

name: Garrett Grabowski
text: Pizza is always awesome, but when I arrived to pick up my take out order at the agreed upon time, they told me they lost my pizza in the machine. I don‚Äôt know if this was suppose to be a joke or not but they def didn‚Äôt offer me anything in ‚Ä¶More

name: Lindsey Smith
text: Very impressed with my experience tonight! I actually cannot believe how many to go orders they had- probably 100 orders ready, a waterfall of tickets coming out of the printer, and the phone was ringing constantly. With all that going on, ‚Ä¶More

name: Tiffany Strain
text: You can not go wrong eating at this location of Mellow Mushroom! Great customer service and those pretzel bites with the beer cheese dip is DIVINE.  Just thinking about their pizza dough makes my mouth water. 10 out of 10 would recommend.

name: mustafaa khalipha
text: CUSTOMER SERVICE WAS EXCELLENT. FOOD GREAT AND PRICES ARE ABOUT AVERAGE.

name: Danielle7 Rodriguez
text: The Ritz Burgers the best burger I have ever had. Will definitely be going back again

name: Sandra Strain
text: This pizza was wonderful! The bread knots are fantastic! I highly recommend and it was close to the hospital.

name: Dana Marek
text: Like an idiot I put in the wrong address for my order.  My order was delivered to some lucky person.  The Manager was so amazing.  She re-made my order and got it out to me.  They were so nice on what is obviously my mistake.  Thank you for being so kind!!!

name: Raul Rosario
text: Chicken and BBQ. Bri was an awesome help and recommended this pizza. It was Great!

name: Jonathan Garcia
text: Very good pizza I tried the veggie one a little to much black olives but still crunchy and yummy I also tried the cinnamon pretzels but they were kinda hard and chewy

name: Ryan Elder
text: Pizza always has been bad I don't know how this place has stayed open this long. You definitely have to be a stoner to like this psychedelic atmosphere restaurant

text:
Great pizza but I always have to wait on my orders.

text: Great pizza, hell great food all around. Prices are high for pizza, but the pizza is worth it. Definitely grab the bruschetta, probably the best in Atlanta!

text: From Chicago and this place was awesome. Good food good drinks good people good vibes and most importantly good prices. Nate was awesome ü§ô I don't leave reviews unless it's terrible and if it's good I leave a good tip but I felt it was worth it to leave a review üëç

name: Bernard Stokes

name: Kishore Balan
text: Great atmosphere and friendly staff. Food selection is good especially for vegetarian/vegan options.

name: Gregory Lewis
text: Great place for group of friends to eat and enjoy each others company. Good food for the price; mixed drinks are hit or miss. ‚Ä¶More

text: I have been a frequent mellow mushroom customer at the midtown location for years. This was my first visit to the Buckhead location. The food was very good and the service was excellent! I highly recommend asking for Ally if you visit this location. She will take great care of you!

name: Julia Reeves
text: Love their pizza, it was only open their take out due to COVID. The person I dealt with was great.

name: Kendall Peery
text: I love this location! Chill staff, lots of art, and I used to live right across from it. Easiest pick up ever!

name: Edmond Joe
text: Always enjoyed their pizza regardless of location. This one is no different.  Pizza is always oh so good.  This location is a short 5 minute walk from the Atlanta Amtrak station.  If the Amtrak train is late, you have a dependable place for dinner that is close to the train station.

name: Chris Lytle
text: Great lunch with the family. Waiter was very attentive and even offered to cut our large pizza into skinner slices to make it easier for our toddler boys to eat which was a nice touch. Mellow Mushroom pizza is always delicious and we will be back.

name: Tameka King

name: LaQuita

name: Ashley Jackson

text: Great place. We traveled with a 12 year old with gluten and dairy allergies. The staff was just incredible. Thank you!

name: Marcus Jones
text: It was pretty decent. Went for a trivia night, had some good food (calzone). Couldn't hear the trivia very well though and the table had a massive pillar in the middle of it, which made it hard to talk to some of the group.

text: Bad for the third time!!! I love mellow mushroom but this location is a hit or miss and this one struck out! The food just wasn‚Äôt fresh. The pizza dough, wings and sandwich bread was not tasty at all. I should have saved my money and went to Taco Mac as planned.

name: Jay

The stores entrance was unlocked and the hours on goggle said they were open and then we were turned away plus the staff that met us at

text: I went there for dinner last night and got a Greek salad and small sausage and onion pizza. It was delicious and the service was excellent. Always checking on me and my food came out fast!

name: Chris Pamm
text: Love this place and the Thursday night trivia. However, recently they stopped validating parking at the lot across the street so it costs $8 to park if their normal lot is full (which it typically is during busy hours).

If your some one who likes a nice slow lazy train ride into Atlanta and get of at Peachtree station, walk a little ways up the street and plant yourself down at this mellow mushroom. Hospitality, is excellent, especially from the bartenders.

name: Nancy Nicholson
text: Ordered out.  Pizza delicious, salad yummy.

name: Jabria Oliver
text: Absolutely amazing service! Delicious food. I ordered the half Steak & Cheese hoagie and it was very good and filling. Waitress was given $15 just for the awesome 1st time experience. It was our first time at any Mellow Mushroom and it was great. Will go again.

name: Katlyn Brady
text: Overall, the pizza was delicious and filling. The crust was not too thin and not too thick, and perfectly cooked. The sauce tasted unique although I prefer a bit more spice in my sauce. Good and efficient service too

text: Great neighborhood spot geared toward the local crowd, it's easy to miss on the street if you're not looking for it. Great beer selection and great pizza. text: Love the seasoning on the crust, additional parking is sometimes required by the parking garage down the street. Rates are usually less than $5 for the duration of a meal.

text: One of my daughter's favorite places to go for Friday night pizza. The food never disappoints and the drinks are pretty good too. Parking in the main lot can be a pain, but there is validated parking just up the street.
